Package pl.edu.pwr.student.IO.Output

Class BasicReceiver

java.lang.Object
pl.edu.pwr.student.IO.Output.BasicReceiver
All Implemented Interfaces:
CreatableInstance, SignalReceiver
Direct Known Subclasses:
DebugLED, DebugPrinter, LED, Speaker
public abstract class BasicReceiver extends Object implements SignalReceiver
An abstract class that represents a basic receiver with a single input and no outputs.

      public boolean attemptConnect(SignalSender sender)

    • fullDisconnect

      public void fullDisconnect()
      Method that fully disconnects this gate by disconnecting all input and output signals. Necessary to completely remove a gate from simulation and allow it to be collected by the garbage collector.
      Specified by:
      fullDisconnect in interface SignalReceiver
